name: Robocharger
description:
Robocharger is a game about robots that can't turn right. It was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "only one". In Robocharger, you only need one button to play the game (Left Mouse Button).

Credits:

Programming: Namasonao
Art: Rapg & Namasonao (Mostly Rapg)
Playtesting: Sangatsuko & Chris
